title: Feedback-Driven Learner-Centered Mathematics Education Design

context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining a smartphone-based online platform with bi-monthly in-person classes, operating a summative assessment-centered evaluation system.

learning_goals: Learners identify three or more error patterns by analyzing feedback received from peers and teachers during mathematical problem-solving processes
Learners specify two or more feedback request items when submitting weekly online assignments to seek concrete learning support
Learners provide constructive feedback to at least three peers per session through peer assessment activities during in-person classes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
